post:
ChimeHost is proud to offer our VPS packages with new pricing. A virtual private server can be used for VPN Tunnel, PPTP, Email Server for Work Group, Intranet System, Database, Game Server MMORPG, General Websites, Web hosting, Auto Blogs, Adsense Sites, Reseller Hosting and more.

All plans come with the following:

- 30-days money back guarantee
- Intel Nehalem Quad Xeon CPU nodes
- Enterprise Supermicro hardware (Fast hot swappable bays)
- Enterprise Western Digital Hard Drives
- Enterprise RAID10 with BBU!
- 100mbit Dedicated (Not Shared) Per VPS Node
- Limit 15 VPS per node!
- Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu, Gentoo, Slackware, FreeBSD
- Choice of Windows OS: Windows 2003 32/64bit, Windows 2008 32/64bit, Windows 2008 R2 64bit

- We do not oversell our services.
- All VPS include SolusVM Access
- Semi-managed solutions
- BBB Accredited Business since 2004 with A Rating!
- Disaster Planning N+2 Setup (Hardware, Generators, AC, Routers, Switches, Staff!)
- In-housed Onsite Staff!
- Ksplice Uptrack - Keeping your parent nodes up to date without reboots!


Special 50% OFF for First 6 Months -

Use coupon code "halfvps" to get 50% OFF for first six months. Simply enter the coupon code when paying monthly and the system will give you 50% OFF for first six month.

Order Today - http://www.chimehost.com/virtual-private-servers/

Test IP: 199.71.213.2
Test file: 208.87.242.2/download.zip

F.A.Q.

Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: On average, less than 12 hours after you order your VPS; however we do ask for a 24-hour grace period.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: Los Angeles, California.

Q: What type of server are these VPS hosted on?
A: Intel Xeon Nehalem Quad-Core, 12 GB DDR3, Enterprise RAID10 with BBU!

Q: Can you help transfer our data?
A: Typically we can do this as long as you have the data in a cPanel or DirectAdmin VPS. You will also need to order cPanel with your VPS inorder for us to migrate data.

Q: What payment options do you have available?
A: Currently we accept Paypal only.

Q: Which package is suitable for those who are not familiar with setting up Apache,Linux,MySQL,PHP etc?
A: One should look into "Xen VPS 1" and order cPanel addon with the VPS. cPanel will automate all the task of setting up a web server and we will set everything up for you when you place your order.
